title: Queue times

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I am leveling at the moment and my queues are taking forever. Whats going on?

replies.body: This doesn't seem right!  You may have lost sync with matchmaking, so the timer is still going in the client even though you're not actually in the queue anymore.  Just to be safe, relog and try again.  If it continues then you may want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any instability with your network.  I hope that helps!
